title.narrative: Strengthening Inclusive Development in Chittagong Hill Tracts (CHT)

description.narrative: Strengthening Inclusive Development in Chittagong Hill Tracts. The project will produce results on three interlinked levels strengthening the capacity of the population in the Chittagong Hill Tracts to shape and make decisions that impact on their lives.

condition.narrative: Social and environmental sustainability will be enhanced through application of the UNDP Social and Environmental Standards (http://www.undp.org/ses) and related Accountability Mechanism (http://www.undp.org/secu-srm).

description.narrative: The IRRF is UNDP’s results framework to monitor and report on its achievements against the Strategic Plan 2018-2021. UNDP publishes country level IRRF results that UNDP’s projects contributed to
Country has an improved enabling environment for expansion of decent work and livelihoods: Policy, legal, regulatory and institutional frameworks
Country has data-informed development and investment plans that incorporate integrated solutions to reduce disaster risks and enable climate change adaptation and mitigation
Country has operational end-to-end multi-sectoral early warning systems (EWS) to limit the gender-differentiated impact of: Economic shocks
Country has operational end-to-end multi-sectoral early warning systems (EWS) to limit the gender-differentiated impact of: Natural hazards
Country has operational end-to-end multi-sectoral early warning systems (EWS) to limit the gender-differentiated impact of: Other risk factors
Country has policy measures and institutional capacities in place to increase access to social protection schemes, disaggregated by target groups: Marginalised groups
Country has policy measures and institutional capacities in place to increase access to social protection schemes, disaggregated by target groups: Persons with disabilities
Country has sub-national mechanisms for mitigating risks to urban centres
Country has targets for low emission and climate-resilient development Development plans and strategies
Country is using frameworks that leverage digital technologies and big data for: Access to and protection of information
Country is using frameworks that leverage digital technologies and big data for: Delivery and monitoring of services
Country is using frameworks that leverage digital technologies and big data for: Legal identity and civil registration
Country is using frameworks that leverage digital technologies and big data for: Other critical public services (e.g. public procurement)
Country is using frameworks that leverage digital technologies and big data for: Public engagement
Country is using frameworks that leverage digital technologies and big data for: Urban development using smart technologies
Number of micro, small and medium-sized enterprises utilizing supplier development platforms for inclusive and sustainable value chains

Number of people accessing basic services, disaggregated by target groups Poor people accessing basic services
Number of people accessing basic services, disaggregated by target groups Women accessing basic services
Number of people accessing basic services, disaggregated by target groups Youth accessing basic services

Number of people benefitting from jobs and improved livelihoods in crisis or post-crisis settings, disaggregated by sex and other characteristics (Note: This indicator is reported on an annual basis, not cumulative. Please report expected and actual achievement for the reporting year only, excluding baseline values.) Female

Please report expected and actual achievement for the reporting year only, excluding baseline values.) Male

Number of people benefitting from jobs and improved livelihoods in crisis or post-crisis settings, disaggregated by sex and other characteristics (Note: This indicator is reported on an annual basis, not cumulative. Please report expected and actual achievement for the reporting year only, excluding baseline values.) Total
Country has an improved enabling environment for expansion of decent work and livelihoods: Direct creation of employment in: Private sector (If YES, please provide Number of employment created)

Country has an improved enabling environment for expansion of decent work and livelihoods: Direct support of livelihood in: Private sector (If YES, please provide Number of livelihoods supported)
Country has an improved enabling environment for expansion of decent work and livelihoods: Direct support of livelihood in: Public sector (If YES, please provide number of livelihoods supported)
Existence of new development, risk reduction and recovery intervention(s) that are informed by multi-hazard and other risk assessments

Natural resources that are managed under a sustainable use, conservation, access and benefit-sharing regime: Area of landand marine habitat under protection (hectares)

Number and proportion of women among beneficiaries of recovery programmes (Note: This indicator is reported on an annual basis, not cumulative. Please report expected and actual achievement for the reporting year only, excluding baseline values.) Total beneficiaries
